member.name: T:Shared.LocalParameterAttribute
member.summary: Local selection for TranspilerTool delegate.
member.remarks: If you want to define the local dynamically inside the transpiler, then define and set the name via TranspilerTool.NameLocal.

member.name: F:Shared.LocalParameterAttribute.Name
member.summary: Name of local.

member.name: F:Shared.LocalParameterAttribute.Type
member.summary: Type of local. If missing, will assume by type of parameter.

member.name: F:Shared.LocalParameterAttribute.Index
member.summary: Index of local.

member.name: F:Shared.LocalParameterAttribute.IndexByType
member.summary: Index of local, filtered by exactly matching type.

member.name: M:Shared.LocalParameterAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.Type,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Parameter will be called with a local. By indices is only valid for original locals. Use name for self declared locals.
If name is set, will look for self declared local or create one.
If index is 0 or greater, the absolute index will be chosen. If the type is incompatable an exception is thrown.
If indexByType is 0 or greater, the index in a collection of exact matching type will be chosen.
If both indices are below zero, the current CodeInstruction will determine the local.

member.name: T:Shared.OriginalParameterAttribute
member.summary: Original parameter selection. If you need to define a different name.

member.name: F:Shared.OriginalParameterAttribute.Name
member.summary: Original method name this parameter should be loaded with.

member.name: T:Shared.CacheData`1
member.summary: Cache for slow operations. Will return known solution to specified arguments. Otherwise calls getter and remembers solution in cache.

member.name: M:Shared.CacheData`1.#ctor(System.Func{System.Object[],`0},System.Int32)
member.summary: Cache for slow operations. Will return known solution to specified arguments. Otherwise calls getter and remembers solution in cache.
member.param: Function to resolve unknown solution.
Cache size.

member.name: M:Shared.CacheData`1.Get(System.Object[])
member.summary: Get solution for specific argument collection. Calls getter, if solution not in cache.

member.summary: Get element at index or default.

member.name: M:Shared.Extensions.IsTypeCompatible(System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary:
Checks if right type can be assigned to left type.
Works similiar to IsAssignableFrom, but will returns false for ValueTypes (which need boxing) and void (which overflows the stack).

member.summary: Adds items to a list, which are not already in the list. Types can be different. Compares with Equal() of .

member.summary: Adds items to a list, which are not already in the list. Types can be different. Compares with Equal() of .

member.name: T:Shared.TranspilerTool
member.summary: Tool to automate transpiler modifications.

member.name: F:Shared.TranspilerTool.Index
member.summary: Index of the currently selected line. 'Index' usually refers to this variable.

member.name: F:Shared.TranspilerTool.Code
member.summary: Collection of all CodeInstructions.

member.name: F:Shared.TranspilerTool.Generator
member.summary: ILGenerator. Required for creating new labels or locals.

member.name: F:Shared.TranspilerTool.Original
member.summary: MethodInfo of Original. 'Original' usually refers to the method being patched by the transpiler.

member.name: F:Shared.TranspilerTool.Locals
member.summary: Collection of locals used by the original method.

member.name: F:Shared.TranspilerTool.LocalsExtended
member.summary: Full collection of locals, original or created by this tool.

member.name: F:Shared.TranspilerTool.LabelsExtended
member.summary: Full collection of labels, original or created by this tool.

member.name: P:Shared.TranspilerTool.Current
member.summary: Currently selected line of code.

member.name: P:Shared.TranspilerTool.Next
member.summary: Line of code after selection. Does not move index. Returns null, if end of code.

member.name: P:Shared.TranspilerTool.Previous
member.summary: Line of code before selection. Does not move index. Returns null, if index is 0.

member.name: P:Shared.TranspilerTool.IsStatic
member.summary: True if original method is static. False if it's an instance object.

member.name: P:Shared.TranspilerTool.IsFirst
member.summary: True if index is 0.

member.name: P:Shared.TranspilerTool.IsLast
member.summary: True if index is beyond the collection of lines.

member.name: P:Shared.TranspilerTool.Count
member.summary: Total count of lines.

member.name: P:Shared.TranspilerTool.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Code of a specific index. Does not move selected index.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{HarmonyLib.CodeInstruction},System.Reflection.Emit.ILGenerator,System.Reflection.MethodBase)
member.summary: Requires all optional objects from HarmonyTranspiler. Throws if any is null or original is not of type MethodInfo.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.First
member.summary: Moves index to first line.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.Last
member.summary: Moves index to last line.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.Offset(System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves index by . Negative values are allowed. Does not go past boundaries.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.Seek(System.Func{Shared.TranspilerTool,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Moves index forward until predicate matches. Throws if no match found.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.Rewind(System.Func{Shared.TranspilerTool,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Moves index backward until predicate matches. Throws if no match found.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.Seek(System.Type,System.String,System.Type[],System.Type[])
member.summary:
Moves index forward until calling a matching method or accessing a matching field.
Also resolves property getter, but their setter is ignored.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.Rewind(System.Type,System.String,System.Type[],System.Type[])
member.summary:
Moves index backward until calling a matching method or accessing a matching field.
Also resolves property getter, but their setting is ignored.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.Seek(System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode,System.Object)
member.summary: Moves index forward until a specified OpCode is used. Can optionally compare the operand as well.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.Rewind(System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode,System.Object)
member.summary: Moves index backward until a specified OpCode is used. Can optionally compare the operand as well.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.Seek(System.Boolean,System.Func{Shared.TranspilerTool,System.Boolean}[])
member.summary:
Moves index forward until predicates match in order.
If is true, will place index to the start of the match. Otherwise at the end.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.Is(System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode)
member.summary: Checks if current line matches OpCode.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.Is(System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode,System.Object)
member.summary: Checks if current line matches OpCode and operand.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.Calls(System.Type,System.String,System.Type[],System.Type[])
member.summary: Checks if current line calls or accesses given member.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.Calls(System.Reflection.MemberInfo)
member.summary: Checks if current line calls or accesses given member.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.IsStloc(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if current line stores local and has matching index.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.IsStloc(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if current line stores local and has matching name.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.IsStloc(System.Type)
member.summary: Checks if current line stores local and has exactly matching type.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.IsLdloc(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if current line loads local and has matching index.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.IsLdloc(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if current line loads local and has matching name.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.IsLdloc(System.Type)
member.summary: Checks if current line loads local and has exactly matching type.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.IsLoadConstant(System.Int64)
member.summary: Checks if current line loads a constant.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.IsLoadConstant(System.Enum)
member.summary: Checks if current line loads a constant.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.IsLoadConstant(System.Double)
member.summary: Checks if current line loads a constant.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.InsertCall(System.Delegate,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Injects call. Increments index. Same as or
Delegate may return void. Otherwise the first parameter is taken from the stack and replaced with the return value.
[T] Function([T __stack], [object __instance], [object arg0], [object arg1...])
member.param: If true will inject delegate before current line (still pointing to the same code). Otherwise after (pointing to the new code).
member.remarks:
The delegate may define any of the original parameters, locals, and __instance (if non-static).
These optional parameters are matched by name, with , or with .
If doesn't match any existing locals, then a new one is generated. Non matching parameters will throw.
If the optional parameter's source is ref (or out), then the delegate must also use ref. Otherwise ref is optional.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.InsertPushLocal(System.Boolean,System.Reflection.ParameterInfo)
member.summary: Tries to push local onto stack. Returns true if successfull.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.InsertPushOriginal(System.Boolean,System.Reflection.ParameterInfo)
member.summary: Tries to push original parameter onto stack. Returns true if successfull.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.InsertBefore(System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode,System.Object)
member.summary: Injects IL code. Increments index (still pointing to the same code).

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.InsertAfter(System.Reflection.Emit.OpCode,System.Object)
member.summary: Injects IL code. Increments index (pointing to the new code).

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.InsertBefore(System.Delegate)
member.summary:
Injects call. Increments index (still pointing to the same code).
Delegate may return void. Otherwise the first parameter is taken from the stack and replaced with the return value.
[T] Function([T __stack], [object __instance], [object arg0], [object arg1...])
member.remarks:
The delegate may define any of the original parameters, locals, and __instance (if non-static).
These optional parameters are matched by name, with , or with .
If doesn't match any existing locals, then a new one is generated. Non matching parameters will throw.
If the optional parameter's source is ref (or out), then the delegate must also use ref. Otherwise ref is optional.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.InsertAfter(System.Delegate)
member.summary:
Injects call. Increments index (pointing to the new code).
Delegate may return void. Otherwise the first parameter is taken from the stack and replaced with the return value.
[T] Function([T __stack], [object __instance], [object arg0], [object arg1...])
member.remarks:
The delegate may define any of the original parameters, locals, and __instance (if non-static).
These optional parameters are matched by name, with , or with .
If doesn't match any existing locals, then a new one is generated. Non matching parameters will throw.
If the optional parameter's source is ref (or out), then the delegate must also use ref. Otherwise ref is optional.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.InsertAfterAll(System.Type,System.String,System.Delegate,System.Type[],System.Type[])
member.summary: Same as , but iterates all lines of code.
member.param: Declaring type of the target member.
Name of the target member.
Delegate to run after target.
Optional parameter definition, if target method is overloaded.
Optional generics definition, if target method has generics.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.InsertAfterAll(System.Reflection.MemberInfo,System.Delegate)
member.summary: Same as , but iterates all lines of code.
member.param: Target member.
Delegate to run after target.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.InsertReturn(System.Delegate,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Injects return value. Returns original method, if returning false or void. If the original has a return value, then it must be supplied with __result.
This function will inject necessary load OpCodes.
[bool] Function(T out __result, [object __instance], [object arg0], [object arg1...])
member.param: If true will inject delegate before current line (still pointing to the same code). Otherwise after (pointing to the new code).
member.remarks:
The delegate may define any of the original parameters, locals, and __instance (if non-static).
These optional parameters are matched by name, with , or with .
If doesn't match any existing locals, then a new one is generated. Non matching parameters will throw.
If the optional parameter's source is ref (or out), then the delegate must also use ref. Otherwise ref is optional.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.InsertJump(System.Delegate,Shared.LabelInfo,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Injects jump to given label.
This function will inject necessary load OpCodes.
Use to jump to a specific CodeInstruction.
bool Function([object __instance], [object arg0], [object arg1...])
member.param: Label to jump to, if func returns true.
If true will inject delegate before current line (still pointing to the same code). Otherwise after (pointing to the new code).
member.remarks:
The delegate may define any of the original parameters, locals, and __instance (if non-static).
These optional parameters are matched by name, with , or with .
If doesn't match any existing locals, then a new one is generated. Non matching parameters will throw.
If the optional parameter's source is ref (or out), then the delegate must also use ref. Otherwise ref is optional.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.ReplaceCall(System.Delegate)
member.summary:
Instance methods need their instance as the first parameter!
Replaces the current IL line with call. The delegate must return the replacement return type and must have the same parameters with identical names and order.
object Function(object object_instance, object parameter0, object parameter1..., [object __instance], [object arg0], [object arg1...])

param.name: func
param.b: object Function(object object_instance, object parameter0, object parameter1..., [object __instance], [object arg0], [object arg1...])

member.remarks:
The current line may contain a method call or field access.
The delegate may define any of the original parameters, locals, and __instance (if non-static), but only after the replacement parameters.
These optional parameters are matched by name, with , or with .
If doesn't match any existing locals, then a new one is generated. Non matching parameters will throw.
If the optional parameter's source is ref (or out), then the delegate must also use ref. Otherwise ref is optional.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.ReplaceAllCalls(System.Type,System.String,System.Delegate,System.Type[],System.Type[])
member.summary: Same as , but iterates all lines of code.
member.param: Declaring type of the member to be replaced.
Name of the member to be replaced.
Delegate the member should be replaced with.
Optional parameter definition, if target method is overloaded.
Optional generics definition, if target method has generics.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.ReplaceAllCalls(System.Reflection.MemberInfo,System.Delegate)
member.summary: Same as , but iterates all lines of code.
member.param: Target member.
Delegate the member should be replaced with.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.ReplaceConstant(System.Enum)
member.summary: Change current line's load to a new value. Can be any integer type. Throws if current isn't OpCode.Ldc_i.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.ReplaceConstant(System.Int64)
member.summary: Change current line's load to a new value. Can be any integer type. Throws if current isn't OpCode.Ldc_i.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.ReplaceConstant(System.Double)
member.summary: Change current line's load to a new value. Can be any float-point type. Throws if current isn't OpCode.Ldc_r.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.ReplaceAllConstant(System.Enum,System.Enum,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Change load to a new value. Can be any integer type. Throws if current isn't OpCode.Ldc_i.
Optionally define start and end index.
0 and 1 may change boolean values too.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.ReplaceAllConstant(System.Int64,System.Int64,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Change load to a new value. Can be any integer type. Throws if current isn't OpCode.Ldc_i.
Optionally define start and end index.
0 and 1 may change boolean values too.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.ReplaceAllConstant(System.Double,System.Double,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Change load to a new value. Can be any float-point type. Throws if current isn't OpCode.Ldc_r.
Optionally define start and end index.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.ReplaceNOP
member.summary: Change current line to NOP.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.NextJumpAlways
member.summary:
Moves index forward until a branched jump occures. Then injects jump to the same label.
Throws if a different type of jump is found first.

member.name: M:Shared.TranspilerTool.NextJumpNever
member.summary:
Moves index forward until a branched jump occures. Then replaces its label with a label to the next line.
Throws if a different type of jump is found first.
